title: List of allied military operations of the Vietnam War (1971)
data: Bình Định , Phu Bon and Pleiku Provinces
Redeployment of the 1st Cavalry Division , 2nd Brigade , 25th Infantry Division and 11th Armored Cavalry Regiment from South Vietnam to the United States
ROK 2nd Marine Brigade clear and search operation
1st Reconnaissance Battalion , 1st Battalion , 1st Marines and 1st Battalion , 11th Marines search and destroy operation

1st Brigade , 5th Infantry Division , 101st Airborne Division and 2nd Squadron , 17th Cavalry Regiment operation to support the ARVN Operation Lam Son 719 effort to open Route 9 through Khe Sanh to the Laotian border and to reestablish Khe Sanh as a major combat support base
III MAF , ROK 2nd Marine Brigade and ARVN 51st Regiment operation
ARVN armored and airborne invasion of Laos with US airlift and air support along Route 9 to Tchepone to sever the Ho Chi Minh Trail
11th Infantry Brigade and 198th Infantry Brigade operation
196th Infantry Brigade , 198th Infantry Brigade and ARVN 2nd Division operation
Quang Tin and Quảng Ngãi Provinces
198th Infantry Brigade and ARVN 2nd Division clear and search operation in
Song Ve river valley , Quảng Ngãi Province

1st Brigade , 5th Infantry Division operation intended to locate and destroy enemy forces , eliminate VC infrastructure , conduct reaction/exploitation operations and assist in pacification and Vietnamization
Redeployment of three infantry battalions and one air cavalry squadron from South Vietnam to the United States
ARVN III Corps operation to lure the VC with a regiment placed in Snoul
north of Lộc Ninh on Route 13
ARVN 2nd Division and 71st Assault Helicopter Company operation
Quang Tin , Quảng Ngãi and Kon Tum Provinces
3rd Battalion , Royal Australian Regiment pacification operation in Long Khánh Province

Sea Dragon Deckhouse Five Bo De River , Nha Trang , Tha Cau River Sealords Đồng Hới Pocket Money Custom Tailor End Sweep Paracel Islands East Sea This article is a list of known military operations of the Vietnam War in 1971 , conducted by the armed forces of the Republic of Vietnam , the Khmer Republic , the United States and their allies .
intro: This article is a list of known military operations of the Vietnam War in 1971, conducted by the armed forces of the Republic of Vietnam, the Khmer Republic, the United States and their allies.
